modName: Change Follower Assets Without Diving Into Creation Kit Tutorial
summary: Simple tutorial that will help you change the body, eye color of any follower.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[img]http://funkyimg.com/i/2zbvi.jpg[/img]
[color=#ff00ff][size=5]You just downloaded a insanely beautiful follower and take her in game only to find out she has boobs to her waist bouncing everywhere, or you don't like the eye color then this tutorial is for you.
Just download the easy to follow pictorial PDF and make the changes with ease.



[/size][/color][/center]
author: The Majestic Mod Squad
